command_line: addthreads=${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} && (( addthreads-- )) &&   addmemory=${GALAXY_MEMORY_MB_PER_SLOT:-768} && ((addmemory=addmemory*75/100)) &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/a/7/dataset_3a7abe7a-28ff-4544-9851-9f11b4e3fa53.dat' reference.fa && samtools faidx reference.fa &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/d/7/6/dataset_d76ad01c-3a33-48c3-9601-e087eba798ac.dat' infile &&         samtools view -@ $addthreads -C      -o outfile  --output-fmt-option no_ref   -T 'reference.fa' -t 'reference.fa.fai'   infile
